thread.title: Amazing stay on the upper west side!
thread.title_full: Amazing stay on the upper west side! - Review of NYLO New York City, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Mary G
title: Amazing stay on the upper west side!
text: Fantastic from beginning to end. Great rates, comfy bed, great shower. My favorite part - a comfortable upscale lobby where you can hang out with friends, get some work done while having a drink or snack or just people watch. Could not be happier with my experience!
